Basic Alerts

There are four alerts: Info, Warn, Error, Success, and here is how you generate them:

Links in Alerts

Simply add the .tsla-alert-link class and links will match the color of the alert as appropriate

Well done! You successfully read this important alert message.

×

Heads up! This alert needs your attention, but it's not super important.

×

Warning! Better check yourself, you're not looking too good.

×

Oh snap! Change a few things up and try submitting again.

×
code demo coming soon

Inline alerts

Useful for inline notation on something new/warnings/info/errors.

note note note note
code demo coming soon

What happens on mobile?

Nada. Just let it flow naturally.
